channel.title: How do i make certain items spawn with a certain code like ::pure
channel.description: i need to know how i can make certain items spawn after typing a certain code

item.title: How do i make certain items spawn with a certain code like ::pure
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I knowâ€¦ this may be too hard for you lol. But you can do it like this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure"))
{
addItem (xxxx,1);
addItem (xxxx,1);
addItem (xxxx,1);
addItem (xxxx,1);
}

Just change the xxxx to the item ID you want and the 1 is that how many items, if their noted you can make as many as you want
and then add it with your other commands.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make certain items spawn with a certain code like ::pure
